token.title: Setup Token
token.description: The Token setup requires an external browser to get finally the access token.Details can be found https://github.com/marq24/ha-fordpass/blob/main/doc/OBTAINING_TOKEN.mdPlease follow the steps:1. Copy the URL below2. Open a Browser (with enabled developer tools) and paste the copied URL into your second browser3. Enter your Fordpass credentials (again) and press the login button4. Watch the Network-tab till you see the `?code=` request5. Copy the full `Request-URL` from this request from the browsers developer tools and paste it in the Token field below6. Click OK to continue
